page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF THE BLOCK
page.content: The area can be divided into three distinct sections.To the north there is a mixture of council houses,private houses,shops and trading estates,in general a working class community.The middle of the block consists mainly of farming land with three large buildings of note.The southern part of the block is predominantly middle class where housing is entirely private in a rural setting. Another feature of the block is that the river wear divides the area by flowing from north to south.
